description: This file defines the `AnalyticsService` class which provides methods for aggregating and returning analytics data related to Black Friday trends, retailer behaviors, and user savings summaries. It appears to act as a service layer component with placeholder implementations.

classes.name: AnalyticsService
classes.description: A service class providing analytics aggregation functions with placeholder logic.

methods.name: blackFridayTrends
methods.description: Returns sample metrics related to Black Friday trends, such as average discounts and top categories.

methods.name: retailerBehaviors
methods.description: Returns information about retailer behaviors, including retailer count and popular early discount starters.

methods.name: savingsSummary
methods.description: Provides a summary of user savings, including estimated savings and tracked items.
